attributes.action: Northern Ireland / newry&mourne needs a Air fire Fighting service for wild fires
attributes.background: Mountain Wild fires in newry&mourne is starting to become more and more common over the pass few years. With the most recent one only a few weeks ago in Newcastle Co.Down where it came very close to destroying houses and a holiday park. Resulting in hundreds of people having to be evacuated.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Public safety and the Northern Ireland Fire and Rescue Service are devolved, so the Northern Ireland Assembly is responsible. 

If you'd like to send your petition to the Northern Ireland Assembly, you can find the contact details here:

http://www.niassembly.gov.uk/about-the-assembly/contact-us/
